name: Beberserker
storyline: Satan has turned your former kindergarten classmates into demons. The only thing you have to fight them is your fists. You are the BEBERSERKER.
summary:
Inspired by 90s FPS and frenetic arcade games, Beberserker is a fast-paced FPP (First person Puncher) in which you must defeat Satan’s Offspring using your bare hands. Taking advantage of the movement versatility your hits provide, you must defeat as many babies as you can. 
 
•	Play in browser. You don’t need to download the game! 
•	Use our leaderboard system to compete against your friends. 
•	Prove your might and enter our “Infernal Altar”. 
•	Brutal progressive metal soundtrack.
